alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 12:30AM PST until January 07 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches, except a dusting to two inches below 2000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The period of heaviest snow is expected to occur between 2-10 AM Saturday morning when snowfall rates peak between 1-2 inches per hour.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
